note:
This app is written for:

  1. writing all of your notes
  2. being able to give scopes (folders) to your notes 

It is going to be written by these ways:

  1. vanilla JS (used design patterns: singleton)
  2. React JS (current version)
  3. Vue JS

This app is created by React JS. 

The normal component structure you create in React JS is based on the aspects below:

  1. component type: class based, function based
  2. some React hooks combinations that you use. The hooks that have the same effect but reach to that effect result in a different way, such as useState & useReducer

Used libraries:

  1. CKEditor 5: 

    throughout all the editable elements in this app, I choosed to use ckeditor5.

Unused libraries:

   1. Redux:

    I didn't use Redux, because I wanted to pass the props throught the components.
